topic.title: MS Visual Studio Community 2013 - Compiler and IDE

copyright.copyrholder: ROBERT BOSCH ENGINEERING AND BUSINESS SOLUTIONS LIMITED

section.title: Description
section.p: The MS Visual Studio is a common build environment and IDE on the Windows platform. Visual Studio Community 2013 is a new edition that enables the full power of Visual Studio to develop cross-platform solutions. Also Supports Visual Studio extensions that incorporate new languages, features, and development tools into this IDE. (Extensions are available from the Visual Studio Gallery.) More details about Visual Studio Community 2013 can be found here

section.title: Download
Visual studio Community Edition:
section.p: Visual studio 2013 Community Edition can be downloaded from the following Link.
section.title: Multibyte MFC Library for Visual Studio 2013

body.p: Download and install the Multibyte MFC Library which is required for BUSMASTER Compilation from https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40770.
